item.content:encoded: Photo: Nintendo ‚ÄòWe will make an announcement about the successor to Nintendo Switch within this fiscal year‚Äô Nintendo president Shuntaro Furukawa officially acknowledged Nintendo is making a Switch successor ‚Äî called Switch 2 by many, albeit not by Nintendo ‚Äî in a message coinciding with the company‚Äôs yearly financial results. Yes, we all knew the Nintendo Switch successor was coming, but Nintendo had said nothing about the console ahead of Furukawa‚Äôs message. ‚ÄúThis is Furukawa, President of ...

item.title: Vecna: Eve of Ruin, D&D‚Äôs final 5th edition campaign, delivers the high-level combat fans have been asking for | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Admittedly, lots of them have eight legs Vecna: Eve of Ruin is unlike anything yet published for the modern incarnation of Dungeons & Dragons. The final campaign for the original 5th edition rule set...
item.content:encoded: Admittedly, lots of them have eight legs Vecna: Eve of Ruin is unlike anything yet published for the modern incarnation of Dungeons & Dragons. The final campaign for the original 5th edition rule set begins at level 10, far higher than some other published adventures reach over the course of their entire run. It then proceeds to top out at the system‚Äôs hard level cap of 20. That much experience will convert you and your party into magically infused, professionally trained killing machines. Trus...
